Articles.Content:
I dont think you know how this works, you need to add a downside.

Press the button, and you have a 75% chance to get all the seasons, past and future, of your favorite TV show on dvd + a huge supply of chips/crisps (depends where you live) and soda.

However, 25% chance to be forced to watch the 4 seasons of My Little Pony.

Bronies however have to watch every episode of all the previous generations.

Hell yeah *presses* FUU-

If you press this button, you will travel to Kerbin and become one of the Kerbals. But you become one of Danny2462's victims.

...

Pressing this button will send you to the moon - but there's a 40% chance that you do not have a space suit!

I'll press it. My situation couldn't get much worse from it (also, the space suit doesn't really matter anyway, since you said nothing about a return craft).

You'll get 100Ã¢â€šÂ¬ for every successful MÃƒÂ¼n landing in KSP.

You'll lose 10000Ã¢â€šÂ¬ per every kerbal that dies.

Also, reverting/quickloading isn't allowed, if you revert/quickload, you will still have to pay for dead kerbals, but you will not get money for successful landings.

Edited June 16, 2014 by xrayfishx

Oh, sure, you did'nt mention debug menu and other mods/hacks/exploits , man i'm gonna be soooo rich

Press that button to get a brand new gaming pc with the most uber configuration you can get however it's a 50% chance that you will not get it and your current rig will burn out.

No i just got a new laptop a week ago

press the button to have all the space agencies of Earth unify to lead humanity to colonize the solar system and beyond but EA will buy off KSP and Steam

I would press the button, but I don't exactly like EA's games.

Press the button to get a new iPhone 6 FREE! It doesn't have phone service. You'll have to use FB Messenger, my friend.

I just won't use it to phone.

PRESS

Get a free trip to Mars for 10 years, then Europa for 10 years. Then the rest of your life on Venus.

One way.

Why not?

Press for a American Mars landing, but the conspiracy theorists will pile up and up.

*BOOP* Mars is fun, and conspiracy theories somehow never make it to the mainstream.

Press for infinite wisdom, but no one believes you.

I would press it, but everyone would think I'm crazy.

Press to teleport to Kerbin. However, there's a 50% chance Jool will get in the way, and you teleport there, and a 75% chance the Sun will get in the way, and you TP there.

nope.

50% +75% =125% =BLACK HOLE SPACE TIME RIFT DEATH

Push the button to live forever, but everyone else in the world would live a 20% shorter life for the rest of eternity.

I'd smash that button until the number for others would decrease to 100%. Man, screw all humanity.

Pressing the button will make the person you hate the most burn alive. 1% chance to do the same to the person you love.

No.

Press the button to have Curse go away and be replaced with spaceport 2, but the forums now get hosted by curse.

No thanks.

Press button to have all text in Comic Sans, but it's multicolored.

(Because only kool kids use Comic Sans.)

I am ok with Comic Sans.

Press the button to make everything perfect. However, there's a 55% chance it'll make everything perfect for your worst enemy.

NOPENOPENOPE

Where's the fun in perfection?

I my hand, i have a button.

Press it, and Unity 5.0 (With 64-bit support) is released. However, KSP becomes about 25% less stable.

Dont press it, and all will remain the way it is.

no i can't risk it

press to be propelled 50 years in the future but there is a 50% chance that everything is a lot worse

Nope.

Press to have a one-way ticket to Gliese 581c.

One way.

Why not?

Press the button for a universe-imploding event involving Danny2462.

Danny's great. PRESS!

Press to teleport a Pringles can to you. However, there's a 99.9999999% chance you'll be squeezed into it, doing all sorts of.... Danny..... things.

No.

Press to become Elsa from Frozen. 3% chance this happens:

http://constable-frozen.tumblr.com/post/88855604213/mini-elsa

Nope, btw who the .... is Elsa?

Press that button to become Elon Musk however there is a 10% chance that you become Olama Sin Baden.

Nope.

Press to teleport to the core of the sun, there's a 195% chance you will evaporate immediately.

Uhhhhhh... Hmmm hard decision. I wont press it.

Press for a 50/50 chance that the doctor or master instantly teleport to your location.
